mapper.insert: insert into announcement ( id, announcement_title, announcement_content, announcement_url, admin_id, announcement_date, announcement_important, is_regi ) values ( 5, #{announcement_title}, #{announcement_content}, #{announcement_url}, #{admin_id}, sysdate, #{important}, #{is_regi} )
